SEARCH
Package jakarta.jms

Interface XAConnection

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Connection
All Known Subinterfaces:
XAQueueConnection, XATopicConnection
public interface XAConnection extends Connection
The XAConnection interface extends the capability of Connection by providing an XASession (optional).

The XAConnection interface is optional. Jakarta Messaging providers are not required to support this interface. This interface is for use by Jakarta Messaging providers to support transactional environments. Client programs are strongly encouraged to use the transactional support available in their environment, rather than use these XA interfaces directly.

Since:
JMS 1.0
Version:
Jakarta Messaging 2.0
See Also:
  • XAQueueConnection
  • XATopicConnection
